original_title: O Jogo da Dívida: Quem Deve a Quem?
overview: Documentary about the Latin American foreign debt, made in five blocks that cover everything from a brief history of debt to some possible alternatives for a solution, passing through the description of its mechanisms, its most serious crises and its social consequences.

production_companies.name: Centro de Criação de Imagem Popular (CECIP)

title: O Jogo da Dívida: Quem Deve a Quem?
